jobs_results.title: Senior IOS Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Yassir is the leading super App in the Maghreb region set to changing the way daily services are provided. It currently operates in 45 cities across Algeria, Morocco and Tunisia with recent expansions into France, Canada and Sub-Saharan Africa. It is backed (~$200M in funding) by VCs from Silicon Valley, Europe and other parts of the world.

We offer on-demand services such as ride-hailing and last-mile delivery. Building on this infrastructure, we are now introducing financial services to help our users pay, save and borrow digitally.

Helping usher the continent into a digital economy era. We‚Äôre not just about serving people - we‚Äôre about creating a marketplace to bring people what they need while infusing social values.

About the role
‚Ä¢ We are looking for a senior iOS developer to join our tech hub in Berlin and support our growth and expansion. You will be part of the engineering team, working with a high-quality code base and the latest tools, where you will promote your skills to be an expert in complex frontend development in iOS (swift). Your primary focus will be the development of mobile applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure.

About your role as a iOS mobile developer
‚Ä¢ Design and build mobile applications using iOS (swiftUI) platform.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features
‚Ä¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization
‚Ä¢ Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and products.
‚Ä¢ Work with the engineering and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and then translate that into a pragmatic and effective technical solution
‚Ä¢ Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results on schedule

About your experience
‚Ä¢ Must have technical skills with at least 4 years of experience
‚Ä¢ Language: iOS (swift) native
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notification
‚Ä¢ Web architecture: Rest and restful APIs, micro-services
‚Ä¢ Version control: GIT
‚Ä¢ Nice to have technical skills (Strongly advised)
‚Ä¢ Containers: Docker, kubernetes
‚Ä¢ Caching, Redis server
‚Ä¢ Scaling, Web load balancing
‚Ä¢ Experience in a rapidly growing company in the mobility, on-demand or fintech space is a plus
‚Ä¢ BSc/MSc in Engineering, Computer Science or relevant field

Why you should join Yassir
‚Ä¢ üòé You will be part of one of the first Algerian startups to go through the Y Combinator program and one of the fastest-growing tech companies in North Africa. We are current in +30 cities (Algeria, Tunisia, Morocco, Senegal, France and Germany)
‚Ä¢ üí∏ Attractive salary and you even get a stake in the company
‚Ä¢ üöâ Subsidized public transit pass
‚Ä¢ ü§ôüèΩHave a lasting impact on our company's culture
‚Ä¢ üöÄ Perfect timing with renowned investors to build something great
‚Ä¢ üìà Extremely steep learning curve with own responsibility and intensive guidance
‚Ä¢ üíØ Make a real impact on the world by helping us bring affordable financial and on-demand services to millions of Africans

At Yassir, we believe in the power of diversity and the importance of an inclusive culture. So, if you're ready to bring your unique perspective and experiences to the table, then we're excited to listen.

Don't just apply for a job, come and be a part of our journey. Let's create a better tomorrow together.

We look forward to receiving your application!

Best of luck,

Your Yassir TA Team

Senior Mobile Software Engineer
Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
Our partner is a product company that creates a one-of-a-kind cloud-based product that helps businesses connect with each other instantly.

What do we need?
‚Ä¢ Experience in native mobile development for iOS
‚Ä¢ Understanding of algorithms and data structures.
‚Ä¢ System and network programming experience is a plus - OS basics, processes, I/O.
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Windows and Unix-based OSes.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of C/C++ development.

What you'll do?

‚Ä¢ Reproduce and learn complex usage scenarios and analyze their problems.
‚Ä¢ Be part of the newly formed Mobile team.

What's the offer?
‚Ä¢ Stock options and competitive compensation package.
‚Ä¢ Unlimited paid time off.
‚Ä¢ Monthly team buildings, events, and gatherings that help build strong bonds within the team.
‚Ä¢ Additional full-coverage health & dental package.
‚Ä¢ Budget for a benefit platform with different options to choose from.

If you consider yourself an ambitious person who wants to join a rewarding and challenging environment, please send your CV in English. Please mind that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Good luck!

jobs_results.title: React Native Mobile Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.via: USNLX Virtual Jobs - National Labor Exchange
jobs_results.description:
Join Us at IQVIA!

We are looking for talented individuals to join our team and help us revolutionize patient care with our electronic clinical outcome assessment (eCOA) platform. Our fast, flexible, and proven solution enhances efficiencies, delivers real-time data, and sharpens insights, all while providing a superior patient experience.

Who we‚Äôre looking for:

You will be part of a growing team of developers located across the world, focused on building new and modern software that‚Äôs positioned to disrupt the clinical trial space. In this remote role, you‚Äôll be empowered and encouraged to think ‚Äúoutside the box‚Äù to develop innovative solutions to drive business and the industry forward. You believe that pushing yourself out of your comfort zone is the only way to grow. You love the idea of owning a product, from developing new mobile app features to scaling to meet market demands. Not only are you fluent with React Native, but you‚Äôre an expert with JavaScript/TypeScript.

Position overview:

We‚Äôre seeing immense growth in the industry, and our core focus is scaling our native application‚Äôs feature set. Bring your talent and drive to our team of passionate, creative, and innovative thinkers, focused on developing a sophisticated product that uses modern JavaScript. We have the support and resources of a large company but operate with a start-up culture. You‚Äôll thrive in a fast-paced and agile environment, during which you see real-time results. As we work to rapidly expand our team, you‚Äôll have the opportunity to grow your career in the direction that‚Äôs right for you.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
‚Ä¢ Serve as critical development resource on cross platform mobile application
‚Ä¢ Work collaboratively and efficiently across functional teams in a fast-paced startup-like environment.
‚Ä¢ High standard of engineering quality through source control, code reviews, continuous integration, and unit tests.
‚Ä¢ Extend our platform to handle an expanding set of features.
‚Ä¢ Improve infrastructure and application development
‚Ä¢ Review and refactor legacy code
‚Ä¢ Provide input on the establishment of development best practices and standards for the organization

SKILLS:
‚Ä¢ Expert in React Native, React, and Redux
‚Ä¢ Expert in JavaScript and TypeScript
‚Ä¢ Experience with SQL databases (SQLite/Postgres)
‚Ä¢ Experience with Swift, Objective-C, Java, and Kotlin are a plus
‚Ä¢ Experience with mobile application deployments (Android/iOS)
‚Ä¢ Experience with data/event streams (Amazon Kinesis/Apache Pulsar)

IQVIA is a leading global provider of clinical research services, commercial insights and healthcare intelligence to the life sciences and healthcare industries. We create intelligent connections to accelerate the development and commercialization of innovative medical treatments to help improve patient outcomes and population health worldwide. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com

IQVIA is a world leader in using data, technology, advanced analytics, and expertise to help customers drive healthcare ‚Äì and human health ‚Äì forward. Together with the companies we serve, we are enabling a more modern, more effective and more efficient healthcare system, and creating breakthrough solutions that transform business and patient outcomes.

To get there, it takes diverse skills and a curiosity to explore new possibilities. No matter your role, everyone at IQVIA contributes to our shared goal of improving human health. Thank you for your interest in growing your career with us.

EEO Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Disabled

jobs_results.title: Developer Support Engineer
jobs_results.description:
About us:

RevenueCat makes building, analyzing, and growing mobile subscriptions easy. We launched as part of Y Combinator's summer 2018 batch and today are handling more than $4B of in-app purchases annually across thousands of apps.

We are a mission driven, remote-first company that is building the standard for mobile subscription infrastructure. Top apps like ChatGPT, VSCO, Notion, and ClassDojo count on RevenueCat to power their subscriptions at scale.

Our 80 team members (and growing!) are located all over the world, from San Francisco to Madrid to Taipei. We're a close-knit, product-driven team, and we strive to live our core values: Customer Obsession, Always Be Shipping, Own It, and Balance.

The Role

If you‚Äôre looking to jumpstart your career in tech and have a direct impact on apps used by billions of end-users, the Developer Support Engineer (DSE) role at RevenueCat is a fantastic opportunity. This is one of the few entry-level positions we offer, and it has proven to be an incredible stepping stone‚Äîour current Support Lead, a Product Manager, and a Technical Account Manager each started out as DSEs.

In this role, you‚Äôll help developers integrate the RevenueCat SDK into their apps, troubleshoot tricky edge cases, and unlock new possibilities in subscription monetization. You‚Äôll provide hands-on support for some of the biggest apps in the world‚Äîimagine helping the teams behind ChatGPT, VSCO, PhotoRoom, Notion, and others get the best out of RevenueCat. You‚Äôll be empowered to own the support experience, build out internal tools, and identify improvements that shape how developers everywhere use RevenueCat.

In 2024, our DSEs spoke at conferences in Berlin, Logro√±o, New York, London, and Tokyo. This is optional, but if you're interested, you can meet RevenueCat customers face to face, have fun working our booth, and share your knowledge with developers worldwide.

What you‚Äôll be responsible for
‚Ä¢ Supporting developers daily. You‚Äôll debug issues, untangle complex code paths, and guide developers through onboarding so they can ship subscription features confidently.
‚Ä¢ Collaborating cross-functionally. You‚Äôll partner closely with Engineering and Product to influence the developer experience‚Äîeverything from our documentation to new features.
‚Ä¢ Building tooling and processes. You‚Äôll craft or improve the internal apps and dashboards that make troubleshooting faster and easier, both for you and your teammates.
‚Ä¢ Driving user success. From investigating stack traces to clarifying best practices, you‚Äôll ensure developers can move from ‚Äúblocked‚Äù to ‚Äúshipped‚Äù without missing a beat.

Within your first month, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Deep-dive into the frustrations and roadblocks developers face, helping them get unblocked so they can launch their apps.
‚Ä¢ Familiarize yourself with our support tools and processes.
‚Ä¢ Propose and implement quick wins in our documentation and support articles to reduce common developer pitfalls.
‚Ä¢ Work alongside our engineering team to resolve complex issues and learn the ins and outs of subscription infrastructure.

Within your first 3 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Spot opportunities for product improvements that will reduce developer friction.
‚Ä¢ Build out test apps and reproducible environments to tackle issues head-on.
‚Ä¢ Own onboarding and solution engineering for new developers using RevenueCat, providing a seamless start-to-finish experience.

Within your first 6 months, you‚Äôll:
‚Ä¢ Identify recurring blockers and implement targeted improvements‚Äîboth in our products and in your own support workflows.
‚Ä¢ Craft (and refine) internal dashboards and tooling that accelerate the DSE team‚Äôs efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Make meaningful, self-directed contributions to how we scale support for an ever-growing developer community.

After 12 months, you‚Äôll have:
‚Ä¢ Gained super-hero level intuition for diagnosing the root causes of even the trickiest tickets.
‚Ä¢ Led the charge on hiring, mentoring, and growing our support engineering team.
‚Ä¢ Found new ways to delight developers, turning frustrating subscription problems into smooth, joyful experiences.

About you
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre eager to learn and grow; this is one of the few entry-level positions at RevenueCat and has historically launched multiple careers within our company.
‚Ä¢ You have 2-3 years of experience in an engineering or technical role, or have built and shipped a mobile app that integrates RevenueCat.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre comfortable with either iOS (Swift / Objective-C) or Android (Java / Kotlin) and have a grasp of app development and release processes.
‚Ä¢ You can debug code with minimal info, diagnosing issues from cryptic logs or stack traces.
‚Ä¢ You thrive in an environment that requires creative problem-solving and a ‚Äúget it done‚Äù mentality.
‚Ä¢ You have strong written and verbal communication skills, and you‚Äôre empathetic towards the developer journey.

What you‚Äôll need to be successful
‚Ä¢ Technical curiosity and a willingness to learn new tools and frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Resourcefulness in figuring out solutions when the path isn‚Äôt obvious.
‚Ä¢ Clear communication skills to translate complex issues into helpful, actionable steps.
‚Ä¢ Outcome-oriented mindset, ensuring your support leads to measurable developer success‚Äîfewer tickets, better documentation, and happier customers.
‚Ä¢ Collaboration and comfort with a fully remote, asynchronous setup using tools like Slack, Zoom, Linear, and Notion.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ $112,000 USD Salary regardless of your location
‚Ä¢ Competitive equity in a fast-growing, Series B startup backed by top tier investors including Y Combinator
‚Ä¢ 10 year window to exercise vested equity options
‚Ä¢ Fully remote work environment that promotes autonomy and flexibility
‚Ä¢ Suggested 4 to 5 weeks time off to recharge and focus on mental, physical, and emotional health
‚Ä¢ $2,000 USD to build your personal workspace
‚Ä¢ $1,000 USD annual stipend for your continuous learning and growth

Curious about the interview process? Discover more in our blog post about how we hire and learn tips to help you succeed.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Europe, Belarus, Poland, Kazakhstan

We are looking for experienced Middle/Senior Mobile Flutter Software Engineers to join our core product ‚Äì BOSS Revolution.

You have a chance to work with a team of outstanding professionals on a challenging product.

You will never be bored‚Äîour team is dynamic, as are our products. Be ready to face thrilling professional challenges and use your strong hard and soft skills to solve them as a Team player.

Your primary responsibility is end-to-end development and support of our user experience in our customer-facing apps.

Join us if you want to:
‚Ä¢ Have a unique work experience with a really strong engineering team!
‚Ä¢ Become a part of a multinational and cross-functional team.
‚Ä¢ Boost your career with a big international product company and have new growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Work on new innovative features and bug fixes in a Scrum Team.
‚Ä¢ Take responsibility for the full software development life-cycle.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with business stakeholders and be a part of the product development team.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrate your technology-agnostic positive attitude with the ability to learn and desire to implement solutions using various technologies.
‚Ä¢ Work on high-performing, mission-critical, scalable, and resilient applications and services.
‚Ä¢ Drive aggressive technical debt reduction in close collaboration with developers and automation test engineers.
Join us, if you have:
‚Ä¢ Have around one year of Flutter cross-platform development experience.
‚Ä¢ Have 5+ years of hands-on mobile development experience (Android and/or iOS).
‚Ä¢ Are truly passionate about mobile development.
‚Ä¢ Can communicate in English (B2+).
‚Ä¢ Are a constant learner.
You can please us with:
‚Ä¢ Experience in configuring mobile CI pipelines.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge and experience beyond mobile stack.
We offer you:
‚Ä¢ An exciting and challenging job with talented people around.
‚Ä¢ Really good hardware (a laptop with 32 GB RAM and 512 GB SSD).
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and growth opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Remote work opportunity (with the opportunity to work from offices in Minsk and Warsaw).
‚Ä¢ Superb English lessons.A few words about us:

IDT Corporation is a global communications company founded in 1990 and headquartered in Newark, New Jersey. We are industry leaders in prepaid communication and payment services and one of the largest international voice carriers. We are listed on the NYSE, employ over 1800 people across 20 countries, and have over $1.5 billion in revenues.

We are not ‚Äùanother big IT corporation‚Äù‚Äî we encourage and support in-house entrepreneurs in developing their ideas into business actions.

Our flagship brand, Boss Revolution, offers Money Transfer, International Calling, and Mobile Top-Up services and supports IDT‚Äôs mission of enabling people to keep in touch and share resources with family and friends worldwide.

If you are here, it seems like you are interested, so let‚Äôs chat! üòâ

jobs_results.title: Senior Mobile Application Developer Android (all genders)
jobs_results.description:
The adesso Group is one of the largest German IT service providers and has outstanding opportunities for growth. At its own locations in Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Turkey, Spain, the Netherlands, Bulgaria, USA and the UK as well as at numerous customer sites, adesso offers consulting and software development services for optimizing core business processes and reducing operating costs.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Participate in the implementation and maintenance of Android apps and software components
‚Ä¢ Engage in the full life-cycle of a product, from early concepts and prototypes to full deployment
‚Ä¢ Define clean, safe and reusable code
‚Ä¢ Promote good software engineering practices
‚Ä¢ Actively participate in the team‚Äôs and company‚Äôs agile processes
‚Ä¢ Participate in combined development with iOS and Android teams in various locations

REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢ B.Sc. or M.Sc. degree in Software Engineering or equivalent
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of experience developing and maintaining complex Android apps
‚Ä¢ Excellence in Java programming, focused on code quality and ease of maintenance
‚Ä¢ Excellent knowledge of modern software engineering principles like continuous integration, code reviews, test-driven development, refactoring and incremental delivery
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of networking (REST and Web Services), Android frameworks and APIs
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ English language proficiency, written and spoken
‚Ä¢ German language skills above B1 is an advantage

CONTACT
You will like working with us! Apply online now, including your salary expectations

and the earliest possible starting date.

jobs_results.title: Android developer for Embedded Mobile Apps
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Bulgaria

About the client:

An independently-owned Global business solutions company enabling offshore operations from a locations in the Philippines, India, Bulgaria, Vietnam, Belgium and the US. With European roots, they provide services to global companies that have offices in every populated continent in the world. They have been in the industry for over a decade, growing from a handful to over 1200 happy employees over the years.

ÔªøÔªø

About the job

The client is a Paris-based startup working on the future industry standard for touchless building access control solutions. Their innovative solution, based on leading edge technologies, will allow you to gain experience with IoT, highly scalable Cloud Platforms, complex integrations via API and latest generation apps with carefully crafted UI/UX.

The company automates the process of securing residential building access and has several unique core features which are attracting enormous interest from within the industry. This has resulted in closing their latest round of funding which allows them to now ramp up their development and you will hold a key position in the engineering team as they move out of their MVP stages.

Responsabilitiies:
‚Ä¢ You will take on the exiting challenge to build, from the ground up, our first set of Android Embedded apps which will run on the company's Access Control devices. Laying solid foundations, you will help us shape the team and organize ourselves into powering our hardware with extremely reliable apps, ensuring smooth integration with our cloud platform and mobile apps.
‚Ä¢ On a regular day, you will work with the product manager, the mobile frontend developers (Android / iOS), the UI/UX designer, the Cloud backend developers, the IoT engineer and the CTO to bring on new features, resolve issues and propose enhancements.
‚Ä¢ You will be involved in various stages of the project, from the requirement analysis to its delivery and production. You will also be involved in contributing to improving features and the overall design of the Platform.
‚Ä¢ As a founding member of the team, you will have the opportunity to take a leadership role, whether it be as a team lead, technology advocate or driving topics that help support your colleagues, customers and the organization.

Who are we looking for?

We are looking for a Mid-level Android Developer with 3+ years of experience;

You are passionate about writing simple, clean, and efficient code and are a strong team-player and communicator.;

You are comfortable with English (written and spoken) and working in a diverse multi-cultural environment;

You are autonomous, eager to collaborate and not scared to share opinions.

You will need:

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ3+ years experience as Android engineer, coding with Kotlin or Java, on IoT projects.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ2+ years' experience on RESTful API client.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ2+ years experience in NoSQL databases (Firestore, MongoDB).

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇExperience building BLE devices, with strong understanding of BLE.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇKnowledge of various wireless protocol (NFC, Lora, ).

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇA good understanding of CI/CD.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇTroubleshooting experience.

Our technology stack:

Current stack (GCP / MongoDB Atlas)

Cloud:

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇAuthentication: Google Identity Platform, but we are migrating to Auth0.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇDatabases: Firestore, but we are migrating to MongoDB.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇPublic/Private API Endpoints: Node/Express docker containers run via Google Cloud Run.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇMessage Queuing: Pub/Sub.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇEvent triggered functions: Google Cloud Function.

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇStorage: Google Cloud Storage.

Apps:

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇiOS: Native SwiftUI iOS app (iPhone, Apple Watch, and later iPad).

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇAndroid: Native Kotlin App (Phone, and later wearable and tablet).

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇWeb: React / Angular.

IoT:

-‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇEmbedded Android apps
